heading: Camera Integration in Rearview Mirror
paragraph: We wanted to integrate our approach seemlessly into existing car interiors without adding too much new hardware. Our solution only appends a small camera to the existing rearview mirror. The camera is used for handgesture recognition to enable the user to actively take decision and interact with the ADS.

heading: Camera Placement
paragraph: As you can see in the figure above, the camera will be very small and lightweight. It is mounted at an angle that recognizes handgestures executed above the center console, the location where the driver would normally rest his hand on.

heading: Future Work
paragraph: We also thought about edge cases, where handgesture recognition might night work. One example is bad lighting. For this case we came up with the idea of implementing a hardware-based haptile user interface as backup. It may be realised as two physical buttons mounted on the center console or something similar.
